title: Teacher jailed for spanking boy with a slipper on his bare bottom in the 1990s
text:

A teacher has been sentenced to 15 months for indecently assaulting a pupil during a "corporal punishment" beating.

Teacher Kevin Shaw, 55, had denied "whacking" the boy with a shoe on his bare buttocks in a store room at a Hull school in the 1990s.

His actions had "absolutely nothing to do with discipline", and he did it for sexual gratification, according to a judge.

Shaw had offered the child 10 strokes on the backside with a shoe with his trousers on, or five with his pants down during the incident.

The prosecution had told his trial there was a "sexual element" to the beating carried out by Shaw.

(Image: Google)

A jury found him guilty of indecent assault over the beating at Winifred Holtby Secondary School in Bransholme on the then-teenage boy.

Hull Live previously reported Shaw had admitted administered dealing out corporal punishment to five or six boys during the course of his teaching career, but denied a sexual element.

The offence took place when he was a geography teacher at the Bransholme school.

The man complained to police about the incident in February 2018.

His trial heard Shaw gave the boy three options after the boy was caught "misbehaving".

He was offered the options of either: being placed on report, his parents being told, or he was told he could be struck ten times on his buttocks.

The boy chose the third option because he was scared of his parents finding out.

He was taken to a store room and made to "bend over at the waist" before Shaw hit him on the buttocks with a shoe in the school store room.

(Image: UIG via Getty Images)

After the second strike, the boy fell to the ground in pain and begged Shaw to stop, which he did.

The jury was told by the prosecution there was a "sexual element" to the punishment administered by Shaw while he taught at the school.

Judge Thackray said he had no doubt the whole incident was a planned pretence for the defendant to see the boy's genitals and to smack his bare bottom.

He told Shaw: "All this was for your sexual gratification" and to "satisfy your perverted desires".

The judge added: "I didn't detect a shred of remorse."

The court heard how the complainant had lived with shame for letting the incident happen to him for years and he suffered a breakdown in 2017.

In a personal statement read to the court, the man described how he felt "powerless at the time".

He said he still had flashbacks even though it was more than 20 years ago.

The man said that he remembered the physical pain but "the humiliation and the indignity was even worse".

The judge said Shaw had done something similar with another teenager and sexually propositioned a third but these did not result in criminal charges.

Grey-haired Shaw, of Perth Street West, Hull, sat in the dock listening to the judge wearing a grey suit, striped shirt and a blue tie.

The defendant, who is married with no children, showed no emotion as he was led from the dock after being handcuffed.
description: Teacher Kevin Shaw was found guilty of indecently assaulting a boy with the shoe during a 'corporal punishment' spanking
